animeTitle: Super Mario World: Mario to Yoshi no Bouken Land
animeDescription: Super Mario World: Mario to Yoshi no Bouken Land is an interactive anime video based on the game Super Mario World. It is designed for use with Bandai's Terebikko system, which utilizes a telephone-shaped microphone to "interact" with the video. It asks the viewer multiple choice questions, such as what will hatch from Yoshi's egg.(Source: Mario Wiki)
animeRelated: ['Other: Amada Anime Series: Super Mario Brothers']
